TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi GridSplitter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb

summary.span: 表示在 控件的列或行之间重新分配空间的控件。

span.span: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件之间重新分配空间行或列中的，而无需更改的维度。The control redistributes space between rows or columns in a , without changing the dimensions of the . 例如，当调整两个列的大小的一列的属性会在同一时间增加相同的量减少其他列的属性。For example, when a resizes two columns, the property of one column is increased while at the same time the property of the other column is decreased by the same amount. 下表显示如何定义水平或垂直通过设置和属性和通过使和属性设置为其默认值。The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical by setting the and properties and by leaving the and properties set to their default values. **如何创建垂直和水平 GridSplitter 控件****How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter 类型GridSplitter type| 值 value| 值 value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |调整行大小Resizes rows||, , , , | |调整列Resizes columns|, , , , || |如果大于或等于，此调整列的大小。If is greater than or equal to , this resizes the columns.

如果是小于，这会调整大小的行。If is less than , this resizes the rows.||| A可以重叠的行或列，其中包含其他内容，或它可以自行占用行或列。A can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself. 有关如何定义，请参阅[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 调整大小的行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)和[如何： 调整大小的列使用 GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information about how to define a , see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). 如果和属性设置并不会实现所需行为，你可以更改和属性设置。If the and property settings do not achieve the desired behavior, you can change the and property settings. A中包含其他对象可能被遮盖集合。A may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the collection of the . 有关如何避免这种情况的信息，请参阅[如何： 确保 GridSplitter 是可见](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md)。For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义中的列的大小进行调整通过覆盖列边缘。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a by overlaying the edge of a column. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridsplittersimpleexample)] 下面的示例演示如何定义中的列的大小进行调整且占用中的列。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a and that occupies a column in the . [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart1)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DragIncrement { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用户使用 控件调整行或列的大小时必须将鼠标拖动的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a control.

value.span: 一个值，表示用户在调整行或列的大小时必须使用鼠标拖动 的最小距离。

span.span: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a to resize rows or columns.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由定义的最小距离当用户拖动鼠标不断地重新初始化。The minimum distance that is defined by is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse. 例如，拖动通过量、 行或列调整大小。For example, when you drag the by the amount, the rows or columns are resized. 要调整大小的行和列，您必须将相同的量。To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the the same amount. 因此，更改为列和行大小由使用鼠标或键盘进行移动开发都在的倍数。Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the are made in multiples of the . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dragincrement)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dragincrement)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dragincrement)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个样式，该样式自定义当 属性设置为 时将显示的 控件预览指示器的外观、效果或其他样式特征。

span.span: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the control preview indicator that is displayed when the property is set to .

value.span: 返回预览指示器的 ，该指示器在您移动 控件时显示可能在 尺寸方面发生的更改。

span.span: Returns the for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in dimensions as you move the control.

value.span: 默认值为当前主题提供的样式。

span.span: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置样式时，有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置要相对于定义了 控件的列或行调整哪些列或行的大小。

value.span: 相应的枚举值之一，这些枚举值指示此 控件调整哪些列或行的大小。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定行或列的大小进行调整，设置和属性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果你不能设置来实现所需的行为和属性，更改或默认值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 调整大小的行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)和[如何： 调整大小的列使用 GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否调整行或列的大小。

value.span: 用于指定是否重设行或列大小的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定行或列的大小进行调整，设置和属性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果你不能设置来实现所需的行为和属性，更改或默认值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 调整大小的行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)和[如何： 调整大小的列使用 GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsPreview { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户拖动 控件时该控件是否更新列或行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.

value.span: 如果显示 预览，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a preview is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A需要对象要在其父树以便显示拖动预览反馈。A requires an object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback. 通常通过满足此要求对象已存在的默认样式中或对象创建的对象。This requirement is typically met by the object that is available in the default style for the or in the object that is created by a object. 但是，如果不属于其中任一这些不可用，控件必须定义其自己对象。However, if neither of these is available, the control must define its own object. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| 当属性设置为`true`中的行或列的大小进行更改的预览将显示。When the property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown. 实际大小发生更改时释放。The actual size changes when the is released. 如果该属性设置为`false`，作为用户拖动实时进行更新的列或行的大小控件。If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the control. 如果使用键盘来移动控件、 列或行的大小更新实时即使属性设置为`true`。If the keyboard is used to move the control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showspreview)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showspreview)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#showspreview)]
